matchzoo.generators package¶

Submodules¶

matchzoo.generators.list_generator module¶

Matchzoo list generator.

class matchzoo.generators.list_generator.ListGenerator(inputs, batch_size=1, stage='train', shuffle=True)¶

基类：matchzoo.engine.base_generator.BaseGenerator

ListGenerator for Matchzoo.

List generator can be used only for ranking.

TODO: Right now, the ListGenerator yield a list each time, that is to say, the batch_size is set to be 1. It can be extended to partial or multiple lists in each batch.

实际案例

>>> np.random.seed(111)
>>> relation = [['qid0', 'did0', 0],
...             ['qid0', 'did1', 1],
...             ['qid0', 'did2', 2]
... ]
>>> left = [['qid0', [1, 2]]]
>>> right = [['did0', [2, 3]],
...          ['did1', [3, 4]],
...          ['did2', [4, 5]],
... ]
>>> relation = pd.DataFrame(relation,
...                         columns=['id_left', 'id_right', 'label'])
>>> left = pd.DataFrame(left, columns=['id_left', 'text_left'])
>>> left.set_index('id_left', inplace=True)
>>> right = pd.DataFrame(right, columns=['id_right', 'text_right'])
>>> right.set_index('id_right', inplace=True)
>>> input = datapack.DataPack(relation=relation,
...                           left=left,
...                           right=right
... )
>>> generator = ListGenerator(input)
>>> len(generator)
1
>>> x, y = generator[0]
>>> x['text_left'].tolist()
[[1, 2], [1, 2], [1, 2]]
>>> x['text_right'].tolist()
[[2, 3], [3, 4], [4, 5]]
>>> x['id_left'].tolist()
['qid0', 'qid0', 'qid0']
>>> x['id_right'].tolist()
['did0', 'did1', 'did2']
>>> y.tolist()
[0.0, 1.0, 2.0]
transform_relation(relations)¶

Obtain the transformed data from DataPack.

Note here, label is required to make lists.

参数:relations (DataFrame) -- An instance of DataFrame to be transformed.
返回类型:list
返回:the output of all the lists' indices.

matchzoo.generators.pair_generator module¶

Matchzoo pair generator.

class matchzoo.generators.pair_generator.PairGenerator(inputs, num_neg=1, num_dup=4, batch_size=32, stage='train', shuffle=True)¶

基类：matchzoo.engine.base_generator.BaseGenerator

PairGenerator for Matchzoo.

Pair generator can be used only for ranking.

实际案例

>>> np.random.seed(111)
>>> relation = [['qid0', 'did0', 0],
...             ['qid0', 'did1', 1],
...             ['qid0', 'did2', 2]
... ]
>>> left = [['qid0', [1, 2]]]
>>> right = [['did0', [2, 3]],
...          ['did1', [3, 4]],
...          ['did2', [4, 5]],
... ]
>>> relation = pd.DataFrame(relation,
...                         columns=['id_left', 'id_right', 'label'])
>>> left = pd.DataFrame(left, columns=['id_left', 'text_left'])
>>> left.set_index('id_left', inplace=True)
>>> right = pd.DataFrame(right, columns=['id_right', 'text_right'])
>>> right.set_index('id_right', inplace=True)
>>> input = datapack.DataPack(relation=relation,
...                           left=left,
...                           right=right
... )
>>> generator = PairGenerator(input, 1, 1, 1, 'train', True)
>>> len(generator)
2
>>> x, y = generator[0]
>>> x['text_left'].tolist()
[[1, 2], [1, 2]]
>>> x['text_right'].tolist()
[[3, 4], [2, 3]]
>>> x['id_left'].tolist()
['qid0', 'qid0']
>>> x['id_right'].tolist()
['did1', 'did0']
>>> y.tolist()
[1.0, 0.0]
transform_relation(relations)¶

Obtain the transformed data from DataPack.

Note here, label is required to make pairs.

TODO: support dynamic size of pairs while number of negative samples is less than _num_neg.

参数:relations (DataFrame) -- An instance of DataPack to be transformed.
返回类型:DataFrame
返回:the output of all the transformed relations.

matchzoo.generators.point_generator module¶

Matchzoo point generator.

class matchzoo.generators.point_generator.PointGenerator(inputs, task=<matchzoo.tasks.classification.Classification object>, batch_size=32, stage='train', shuffle=True)¶

基类：matchzoo.engine.base_generator.BaseGenerator

PointGenerator for Matchzoo.

Ponit generator can be used for classification as well as ranking.

实际案例

>>> import pandas as pd
>>> relation = [['qid0', 'did0', 1]]
>>> left = [['qid0', [1, 2]]]
>>> right = [['did0', [2, 3]]]
>>> relation = pd.DataFrame(relation,
...                         columns=['id_left', 'id_right', 'label'])
>>> left = pd.DataFrame(left, columns=['id_left', 'text_left'])
>>> left.set_index('id_left', inplace=True)
>>> right = pd.DataFrame(right, columns=['id_right', 'text_right'])
>>> right.set_index('id_right', inplace=True)
>>> input = datapack.DataPack(relation=relation,
...                           left=left,
...                           right=right
... )
>>> task = tasks.Classification()
>>> generator = PointGenerator(input, task, 1, 'train', False)
>>> x, y = generator[0]
>>> x['text_left'].tolist()
[[1, 2]]
>>> x['text_right'].tolist()
[[2, 3]]
>>> x['id_left'].tolist()
['qid0']
>>> x['id_right'].tolist()
['did0']
>>> y.tolist()
[[0.0, 1.0]]
